Class Action

CampaignKit.Compendium.DungeonsAndDragons.Common

CampaignKit.Compendium.DungeonsAndDragons.dll

This class is used to represent a particular action that a creature can perform.

Properties

AttackBonus

Gets or sets the attack bonus of the SpecialAbility, if any. The attack bonus is a number you add to your attack roll.

[JsonProperty("attack_bonus")]
public int? AttackBonus { get; set; }

Property Value

int?

DamageBonus

Gets or sets the damage bonus of the Action, if any. The damage bonus is a number you add to your damage roll.

[JsonProperty("damage_bonus")]
public int? DamageBonus { get; set; }

Property Value

int?

DamageDice

Gets or sets the dice used for the damage of the LegendaryAction. This is a string representation of the dice roll (e.g., "1d6").

[JsonProperty("damage_dice")]
public string? DamageDice { get; set; }

Property Value

string

Description

[JsonProperty("desc")]
